summary: This is an email exchange from August 28, 2019, regarding scheduling assistance for multiple interviews related to the Epstein investigation. The email requests help for interviews scheduled at 9:30 AM, 1:00 PM, and 3:30 PM, with one interview specifically involving a corrections officer.

persons.name: Rote
persons.context: Rote sent an email on August 28, 2019, asking if anyone is available to help with interviews for the Epstein investigation the following day.

events.title: Scheduled Epstein Investigation Interviews
events.description: Multiple interviews related to the Epstein investigation were scheduled for the day after the email was sent, including one with a corrections officer.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 28, 2019, and pertains to the Epstein investigation.
Interviews were scheduled for the following day (August 29, 2019) at 9:30 AM, 1:00 PM, and 3:30 PM.
One of the scheduled interviews involved a corrections officer.
The email indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein in late August 2019.
